org.terrier.compression.integer

Interface ByteOut

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteOutputStream

    public interface ByteOut
extends Closeable
    Bytewise counterpart of BitOut
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Matteo Catena

    • Method Detail

      • getByteOffset

        long getByteOffset()
        Returns the byte offset of the stream. It corresponds to the position of the byte in which the next bit will be written.
        Returns:
        the byte offset in the stream.
